languages.text: {n}В руинах повисает напряженная тишина, и лишь ветер беспокоит слух, перебирая листьями вековых деревьев.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В руинах повисает напряженная тишина, и лишь ветер беспокоит слух, перебирая листьями вековых деревьев.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A tense silence pervades the ruins. The stillness is disturbed only by the wind rustling through the centuries-old canopy.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В руинах повисает напряженная тишина, и лишь ветер беспокоит слух, перебирая листьями вековых деревьев.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A tense silence pervades the ruins, and only the wind disturbs the stillness, rustling in the centuries-old canopy.{/n}
{n}A tense silence pervades the ruins, and only the wind disturbs the stillness, rustling in the centuries-old canopy.{/n}
{n}A tense silence pervades the ruins, and only the wind disturbs the stillness, rustling in the centuries-old canopy.{/n}

{n}A tense silence pervades the ruins. The stillness is disturbed only by the wind rustling through the centuries-old canopy.{/n}
{n}A tense silence pervades the ruins. The stillness is disturbed only by the wind rustling through the centuries-old canopy.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un tenso silencio se extiende por las ruinas. El viento es lo único que rompe la quietud al agitar las ramas de los árboles centenarios.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tense silence pervades the ruins. The stillness is disturbed only by the wind rustling through the centuries-old canopy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un tenso silencio se extiende por las ruinas; el viento es lo único que rompe la quietud al agitar las ramas de los árboles centenarios.{/n}

languages.text: {n}紧张的寂静弥漫在废墟之中，唯一打破这寂静的，是微风拂过百年老树的树冠时发出的簌簌响声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tense silence pervades the ruins. The stillness is disturbed only by the wind rustling through the centuries-old canopy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}紧张的寂静弥漫在废墟中。只有微风拂过几百年的古老树冠，发出簌簌的响声。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un silence tendu plane sur les ruines. Seul le vent perturbe le calme ambiant en faisant bruire la canopée séculaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tense silence pervades the ruins. The stillness is disturbed only by the wind rustling through the centuries-old canopy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un silence tendu plane sur les ruines. Seul le vent perturbe le calme en faisant bruire la canopée séculaire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}はりつめた静寂が廃墟を覆う。静寂を乱すのは、数世紀ものの樹冠をガサガサ言わせて通る風だけだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tense silence pervades the ruins. The stillness is disturbed only by the wind rustling through the centuries-old canopy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}はりつめた静寂が廃墟を覆う。静寂を乱すのは、数世紀ものの樹冠をガサガサ言わせて通る風だけだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine angespannte Stille legt sich auf die Ruinen. Die Stille wird nur vom Wind gestört, der durch die jahrhundertealte Decke fegt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tense silence pervades the ruins. The stillness is disturbed only by the wind rustling through the centuries-old canopy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein angespanntes Schweigen liegt auf den Ruinen, und nur der Wind, der durch das jahrhundertealte Blätterdach rauscht, stört die Stille.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gergin bir sükûnet, harabelere nüfuz ediyor. Yüzlerce yıllık tentenin içinden hışırdayarak geçen rüzgâr ise gerginliği bozan yegâne şey oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tense silence pervades the ruins. The stillness is disturbed only by the wind rustling through the centuries-old canopy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gergin bir sükûnet, harabelere nüfuz ediyor. Durgunluğu yalnızca yüzlerce yıllık tentenin içinden hışırdayarak geçen rüzgâr bozuyor.{/n}
